dialogue.text: Wow! That was a load of fun! I kind of want to do that again!
beedibi dopdobop! skeep pidi bop bidi boo.
Yeah, we tour around a lot. We end up singing around three songs before it's time to move to the next location.
You must be really dedicated to your little rap career.
Oh, we are. It's kinda hit-and-miss, though.
Sometimes we battle normal people, and sometimes we battle zombies, sports champions, mysteriously powerful beings... things like that.
Anyway, I'm ready for another round whenever you are!
